-- IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'trip_data_green_copy' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dwh')
-- CREATE TABLE dwh.trip_data_green_copy
-- 	(
-- 	 [year] nvarchar(4000),
-- 	 [month] nvarchar(4000),
-- 	 [Borough] nvarchar(4000),
-- 	 [trip_date] date,
-- 	 [trip_day] nvarchar(4000),
-- 	 [trip_day_weekend_ind] nvarchar(4000),
-- 	 [card_trip_amount] int,
-- 	 [cash_trip_amount] int
-- 	)
-- WITH
-- 	(
-- 	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
-- 	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
-- 	 -- HEAP
-- 	)
-- GO

-- --Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
-- --CREATE PROC bulk_load_trip_data_green_copy
-- --AS
-- --BEGIN
COPY INTO dwh.trip_data_green_copy

FROM 'https://synapsetaxistorage.dfs.core.windows.net/taxifiles/gold/trip_data_green'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy',
	AUTO_CREATE_TABLE = 'ON'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dwh.trip_data_green_copy
GO
